name: Tomato and Arugula Salad
recipeCategory: dinner, easy, lunch, quick, salads and dressings
keywords: appetizer, main course, side dish, arugula, onion, tomato, dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 4 ripe plum tomatoes, cut into wedges
1/2 cup coarsely chopped fresh basil or flat-leaved Italian parsley
Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Pick over the arugula and discard any tough stems. In a large salad bowl add the tomatoes, arugula, onions, garlic, basil, vinegar, salt and pepper and olive oil. Toss well and serve.
